item.description:
~In this wacky Dominican comedy, three wives decide to cast spells on their philandering husbands in hopes of curtailing their cheating ways"A Macho Woman" is a story of a young couple, Ramon (Roberto Angel) and Laura (Ana Karina Casanova). He is 29 years old, she is 27. They have been together for almost 13 years, 9 of marriage and 4 of engagement. Ramon forms a "macho men" trio with his buddies Juan (Daniel Sarcos) and Jose (Jochy Santos) that drive Laura and her friends Karla (Tania Baez) and Lourdes (Maria del Carmen Hernandez), crazy with their irresponsibility, forgetfulness and bad habits. Until one day, in a shopping center, Laura meets a handicraft seller that gives her a necklace that will solve her problems. Through a spell the world turns against men and in this process a series of hilarious but reflective situations arise. Ramon turns from a "Super Macho Man" to a "Real Macho Woman".

The last time I was told to bring a happy movie this time, so this one is as funny as it gets.

***For this one because is a Dominican movie I will be serving authentic Dominican Appetizers and Drinks***

You can see the Trailer here http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9tlESBAAYGA

Â 

Bring friends and family let's make this one a party!

group.name: South Shore Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Pelicula "Que Macho De Mujer"
